title: 'I've got to know the man I killed'
description: James Hodgkinson died after being punched by Jacob Dunne during a drunken brawl.

title: Coronavirus: Schools will be ready for September - minister
description: Reopening schools is a priority for the government and it will be safe, a cabinet minister says.

title: Coronavirus: Covid cluster linked to Aberdeen bar after 13 new cases
description: A cluster of 13 cases of Covid-19 linked to a pub in Aberdeen is being investigated by public health authorities.

title: Coronavirus weddings: 'It's heartbreaking to see my fiancee's face'
description: Couples are frustrated that wedding receptions of up to 30 people are still not allowed in England.

title: Conservative MP arrested on suspicion of rape
description: Police say the allegations relate to four separate incidents alleged to have taken place over six months.

title: Amitabh Bachchan: Bollywood star recovers from Covid-19
description: The Bollywood giant, 77, thanks hospital staff for their care after being treated for coronavirus.

title: Egypt tells Elon Musk its pyramids were not built by aliens
description: Egypt invited the billionaire to visit, after he appeared to tweet support for conspiracy theorists.

title: Kyrgios pulls out of US Open but Murray 'willing to take a risk'
description: Nick Kyrgios withdraws from the US Open citing safety fears caused by the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Coronavirus causes vineyard problems
description: With thousands of vines to prune and not enough staff, the owners put out a plea for help on social media.

title: TikTok: Microsoft pauses talks on buying US arm - reports
description: The tech giant's possible purchase of the China-owned app's US arm were put in doubt by Donald Trump.

title: Tropical Storm Isaias nears coronavirus-hit Florida
description: Forecasters have warned that Tropical Storm Isaias could strengthen into a hurricane.

title: New homes to get 'automatic' planning permits
description: The housing secretary says a "permission in principle" will speed-up building and create jobs.

title: Nasa SpaceX crew return: Astronauts set for ocean splashdown
description: Doug Hurley and Bob Behnken's SpaceX capsule will make the first crewed US water landing in 45 years.

title: In pictures: Europe swelters under near-record temperatures
description: Heat wave alerts were issued in several countries as temperatures rose to 40C this weekend.

title: The rise, fall, and rise of the status pineapple
description: For a couple of centuries, the British were in an unlikely frenzy for the exotic fruit.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: How gardening could help in the fight against obesity
description: In Bradford, community schemes offer a novel approach to promoting healthy lifestyles.
